text: To make a charcoal pit simply dig a hole in the ground. Any solid block works. Solid means that torches can be placed on it.
Cover most of it but leave a bit exposed for ignition
Set it on fire. All connected blocks will ignite. Quickly cover it so doesn't burn.
While processing it will emit smoke particles
After it stops emitting smoke it's done
Dig it up with a shovel. Fortune helps
You will get charcoal and ash in about equal quantities.
Ash can be used to make fertilizer, Which works like bone meal
